message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $90. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $70 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $85.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Hi Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me halfway again?
